name: NSClickGestureRecognizer
desc: A discrete gesture recognizer that tracks a specified number of mouse clicks.

items.name: var buttonMask: Int
items.desc: A bit mask of the button (or buttons) required to recognize this click.

items.name: var numberOfClicksRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of clicks required to match.

items.name: var numberOfTouchesRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of touches required in an NSTouchBar object for the gesture recognizer to match.
